name: Spell Sniper
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Level 4+, Spellcasting or Pact Magic Feature

benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Bypass Cover
effects: Your attack rolls for spells ignore Half Cover and Three-Quarters Cover.

benefits.name: Casting in Melee
effects: Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with spells.

benefits.name: Increased Range
effects: When you cast a spell that has a range of at least 10 feet and requires you to make an attack roll, you can increase the spell's range by 60 feet.
